channel.title: LKM on Innercoder.dev
channel.description: Recent content in LKM on Innercoder.dev

item.title: Linux Kernel Modules: Character Devices
item.description: This post will be part of a series where device drivers will be presented and quickly analized for people that need a quick reference of how to make device drivers on an updated kernel. The driver presented here was tested on a 3.2 and 3.16 Linux Kernel. I will make a driver with more features and test it on a newer kernel next time.
